title: To authorize the National Science Foundation to provide grants to support research projects in science and technology at secondary schools, and for other purposes.
content: Research in Secondary Schools Act - Authorizes the Director of the National Science Foundation to establish a program of competitive grants to institutions of higher education for specified activities in support of research projects in science and technology at secondary schools. Requires the Director to ensure that coordination and information exchange, including by means of the Internet, occur on a continuing basis among grant awardees under this Act.
